{"id":731970022,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 6 months","timestamp":1656269784,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"133 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/731970022/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Wildcard Matching","memory":"26.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    bool isallstars(string s,int i)\n    {\n        for(int k=i;k>=0;k--)\n        {\n            if(s[k]!='*')\n                return false;\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n    \n    bool find(int i,int j,string &s,string &p,vector<vector<bool>>&dp)\n    {\n        if(i<0 && j<0)\n            return true;\n        if(i<0 && j>=0)\n            return isallstars(p,j);\n        if(j<0 && i>=0)\n            return isallstars(s,i);\n        if(dp[i][j]==false)\n            return dp[i][j];\n        if(s[i]==p[j] && s[i]!='*')\n            return dp[i][j]=find(i-1,j-1,s,p,dp);\n        else if(s[i]!=p[j])\n        {\n            if(s[i]=='?' || p[j]=='?')\n                return dp[i][j]=find(i-1,j-1,s,p,dp);\n            else if(s[i]=='*' && p[j] !='*')\n                return dp[i][j]=find(i,j-1,s,p,dp) || find(i-1,j-1,s,p,dp) || find(i-1,j,s,p,dp);\n            else if(s[i]!='*' && p[j]=='*')\n                return dp[i][j]=find(i-1,j,s,p,dp)|| find(i-1,j-1,s,p,dp) || find(i,j-1,s,p,dp);\n            else if(s[i]=='*' && p[j]=='*')\n                return dp[i][j]=find(i,j-1,s,p,dp) || find(i-1,j,s,p,dp) || find(i-1,j-1,s,p,dp);\n        }\n        return false;\n    }\n    \n    bool isMatch(string s, string p) {\n        int l1=s.length(),l2=p.length();\n        vector<vector<bool>>dp(l1,vector<bool>(l2,true));\n        return find(l1-1,l2-1,s,p,dp);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"wildcard-matching","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
